info.author: Michael Kluge
info.description: tests RNA-seq data for differential exon usage
info.paperDescription: Differential exon usage was determined using DEXSeq.
info.dependencies: packages: getopt, DEXSeq, GenomicFeatures, BiocParallel, GenomicRanges, GenomicFeatures

param.name: countFile
param.description: count file with features in rows and samples in columns

param.name: flattedGTFAnnotation
param.description: flatted GTF file which was used to create the count file; created by dexseq_prepare_annotation.py that comes with DEXSeq

param.name: sampleAnnotation
param.description: annotation file with sample names in the first colum and sample condition in the second condition (header: sample\tcondition)

param.name: featureAnnotation
param.description: annotation file which is joined with the count file

param.name: featureAnnotationID
param.description: name of the column with is used for joining

param.name: featureAnnotationName
param.description: name of the column in the annotation file that contains the name of the feature

param.name: excludeSamples
param.description: names of samples that should be excluded from the analysis

param.name: minKeepReads
param.description: number of reads a feature must own in average per sample to pass filtering step before DE test is performed

param.name: threads
param.description: number of threads to use for testing
